content: this adorable cat pillow is perfect for any cat lover its made from soft yarn and perfect to snuggle up with on a cold day materials needed 200 yards of jumbo yarn i used sweet snuggles by loops & threads scrap yarn for embroidery 8mm hook stuffing yarn needle scissors i used 2 different colours of yarn one for each side but thats completely optional this is beginner friendly you must know basic crochet stitches including treble_crochet other than that its pretty much straight forward
